concepts.name: Exponential Functions
concepts.description: Mathematical expressions where the variable is an exponent, modeling rapid growth or decay.

concepts.name: Exponent Properties
concepts.description: Rules governing the manipulation of exponents, including product, quotient, and power rules.

concepts.name: Product of Powers Property
concepts.description: States that when multiplying two powers with the same base, you add their exponents.

concepts.name: Power of a Product Property
concepts.description: When raising a product to a power, the exponent applies to each factor inside the parentheses.

concepts.name: Quotient of Powers Property
concepts.description: When dividing two powers with the same base, subtract the exponents.

concepts.name: Zero and Negative Exponents
concepts.description: Defines zero exponents as always equal to 1, and negative exponents as reciprocal powers.

concepts.name: Fractional Exponents
concepts.description: Represents roots, where fractional exponents such as 1/2 signify square roots.

concepts.name: Scientific Notation
concepts.description: A way to express very large or small numbers using powers of ten, simplifying calculations and representation.

concepts.name: Exponential Growth Functions
concepts.description: Functions that increase rapidly by a consistent multiplicative factor over equal intervals.

concepts.name: Exponential Decay Functions
concepts.description: Functions that decrease by a consistent multiplicative factor over equal intervals, approaching zero but never reaching it.

concepts.name: Geometric Sequences
concepts.description: A sequence of numbers where each term is obtained by multiplying the previous term by a constant ratio.

concepts.name: Real-World Applications of Exponents
concepts.description: Includes problems involving population growth, radioactive decay, financial interest, and more.

concepts.name: Problem-Solving Strategies for Exponential Functions
concepts.description: Involves identifying patterns, creating tables, and using formulas to solve growth, decay, and geometric sequence problems.

concepts.name: Exponential Word Problems
concepts.description: Applications of exponential functions in real life, such as compound interest, population changes, and decay scenarios.
